code: import{axiosConfig}from'./axiosConfig';import{canUpdate,canDelete}from'../utils/permissions';export const getTasks=plantId=>{const url=plantId?"/care-tasks?plantId=".concat(plantId):'/care-tasks';return axiosConfig.get(url);};export const createTask=(taskData,userRole)=>{if(!canUpdate(userRole)){throw new Error('Insufficient permissions to create care tasks');}return axiosConfig.post('/care-tasks',taskData);};export const updateTask=(id,data,userRole)=>{if(!canUpdate(userRole)){throw new Error('Insufficient permissions to update care tasks');}return axiosConfig.put("/care-tasks/".concat(id),data);};export const deleteTask=(id,userRole)=>{if(!canDelete(userRole)){throw new Error('Insufficient permissions to delete care tasks');}return axiosConfig.delete("/care-tasks/".concat(id));};export const getAllTasks=()=>{return axiosConfig.get('/care-tasks');};
